src:
Vučić: Dolazim u Upitnik, nisam snimao unapred emisiju

05 Nov 2019, 18:30

Predsednik Srbije Aleksandar Vučić rekao je da će večeras gostovati u emisiji Upitnik na Radio televiziji Srbije (RTS) i naveo da nije unapred snimio emisiju, te da neće ići na Košutnjak ni u Palatu Srbija da bi je snimao."Prihvatio sam poziv i biću na tom mestu. Nisam snimao unapred, neću ići na Košutnjak, biću u RTS-u. Želim da im poručim da ću doći baš kada je najavljeno, neću mnogo pre vremena da dolazim", rekao je Vučić u telefonskom razgovoru za TV Pink.Rekao je da oni koji su uoči njegovog gostovanja najavili okupljanje ispred RTS-a, ne dolaze da mu postave pitanja kako su rekli, već da "uteraju strah u kosti svakome ko bi im se suprostavio i zbog želje da kontrolišu kretanje ljudi".On je svoje pristalice pozvao da ne dolaze ispred RTS-a u znak podrške, jer po njegovoj oceni aktivisti Jedan od pet milona i Dveri "samo traže incident".Udruženje Jedan od pet miliona i predstavnici Dveri pozvali su ranije danas gradjane da se okupe ispred RTS-a povodom dolaska predsednika Srbije Aleksandra Vučića u emisiju Upitnik.
text:
Vucic: Coming to the Questionnaire, I didn't record the show beforehand

05 Nov 2019, 17:30

Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic said that he would appear tonight on the program Questionnaire on Radio Television of Serbia (RTS) and stated that he did not pre-record the show and that he would not go to Kosutnjak or the Palace of Serbia to record it. "I accepted the invitation and will be on I did not record in advance, I will not go to Kosutnjak, I will be at the RTS. I want to tell them that I will come just when it is announced, I will not be here long before I arrive, "Vucic said in a telephone interview with TV Pink. that those who announced the gathering in front of the RTS on the eve of his visit did not come to ask him questions as they said, but to "instill fear in the bones of anyone who would oppose them and for wanting to control the movement of people." urged not to come in front of RTS in support, because in his estimation activists One of five million and Dver "are only looking for an incident". Association One of five million and representatives of Dver called earlier today citizens to gather in front of RTS on the occasion to flattery of Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic in the issue of Questionnaire.
